Class Pizza

  • java.lang.Object
    • Pizza

  • public class Pizza
extends java.lang.Object
    Pizza Class Represents a pizza size and its condiments Toppings can be added or removed

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pizza()
      Default Constructor Creates a medium cheese pizza by default
      Pizza(Pizza pizzaToCopy)
      Copy Constructor creates duplicate object of the given pizza
      Pizza(java.lang.String m_size, int m_cheese, int m_pepperoni, int m_veggie)
      Overloaded Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calcCost()
      Calculates cost of the pizza Small = $10 Medium = $12 Large = $14 Each topping is an additional 2$
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
      Tests to see if two pizza ojbects are the same
      int getCheese()
      Returns the number number of cheese toppings of the pizza
      void getCheese(int m_cheese)
      Changes the number of cheese toppings of the pizza
      int getPepperoni()
      Returns the number number of cheese toppings of the pizza
      void getPepperoni(int m_pepperoni)
      Changes the number of pepperoni toppings of the pizza
      java.lang.String getSize()
      Returns the number size of the pizza
      void getSize(java.lang.String m_size)
      Changes the size of the pizza
      int getVeggie()
      Returns the number number of cheese toppings of the pizza
      void getVeggie(int m_veggie)
      Changes the number of veggie toppings of the pizza
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns all info of the pizza (size and toppings)
